ai-atk-vin02a18:0_0: (The chapter on offenses entailing acknowledgment in the previous discourse.)
ai-atk-vin02a18:3_0: Those who are included in the eight carves,
ai-atk-vin02a18:4_0: none of these beauty are reckoned.
ai-atk-vin02a18:5_1: There are ghee that have asked for ghee, oil, rice, and porridge cooked, and then eat it.
ai-atk-vin02a18:5_4: And all of them lived there.
ai-atk-vin02a18:5_5: Both physical deeds, verbal, and mental deeds are blameless, not body or speech.
ai-atk-vin02a18:6_0: The chapter on offenses entailing acknowledgment is finished.
ai-atk-vin02a18:7_0: The chapter on offenses entailing acknowledgment is finished.
ai-atk-vin02a18:8_0: and the five rules to be trained in have been recited;
ai-atk-vin02a18:9_0: Sentient beings are treated in a disciplinary issue.
ai-atk-vin02a18:10_0: The monks’ rules and their analysis are recited,
ai-atk-vin02a18:11_0: for the nuns, too, it is appropriate for the Sangha of nuns.
ai-atk-vin02a18:12_0: But since they didn’t praise them,
ai-atk-vin02a18:15_0: The Analysis of nuns is finished.
ai-atk-vin02a18:17_0: Having seen the path in every way, they see the path.
ai-atk-vin02a18:18_0: The discussion of the analysis of both sides is finished.
